short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See and score the accuracy and truth of articles, websites and tweets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In today's world, we are surrounded by misinformation and fake news. Many people take issue in determining the validity of what others say. FactPipe offers a collective intelligence based solution to visually allow readers to rate the validity of any URL on the internet.

By installing the extension, you agree to FactPipe's Terms and Conditions (https://www.factpipe.com/legal) and acknowledge that you have read FactPipe's Privacy Policy (https://www.factpipe.com/privacy). California residents, please see the California Privacy Notice (https://www.factpipe.com/assets/pdf/fp_ccpa_q3_20.pdf).
